column1: Kata Robata////Fresh and delicious sushi at a high price point. I recommend coming here during happy hour if you want to eat your fill
column2: and not pay over $30. They also give you a free dessert on your birthday. I got the green tea cheesecake and it was bitter and terrible
column3: but that's probably just personal preference. I've been here multiple times for dinner
column4: and the parking and customer service have never been an issue. Always make a reservation ahead of time because this place gets packed easily. My mother accidentally left her credit card here once
column5: and they gave it back to her the next day when she returned.
